name: @wildebeest/persistance
description: Persistant module for storing data in browser session

scripts.deploy: npm run test && npm run build && git add -A && git commit -m 'build and deploy' && git push origin master
scripts.patch: npm run deploy && npm version patch && npm publish
scripts.minor: npm run deploy && npm version minor && npm publish
scripts.major: npm run deploy && npm version major && npm publish

author: Peter Gasparik
